hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Burdah: "'Aishah brought a patched woolen Kisa' (cloak), and a thick Izar, She said: 'The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) died in these.'" [Abu 'Eisa said:] There are narrations on this topic from 'Ali and Ibn Mas'ud. The Hadith if 'Aishah is Hasan Sahih Hadith

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي لُبْسِ الصُّوفِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Wearing Wool
